channel.title: Vista + FF +RS == X-P
channel.description: I got a new vista laptop(no choice in OS) and in Firefox, whenever loading Runescape it goes kaplu-E, And freezes for [an] unknown reason(s), just downloaded it, just installed it, and everything else works fine(in FF at the moment). Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Vista + FF +RS == X-P
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“juju, post:18, topic:90621”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=132282.msg1291745#msg1291745 date=1178769300]
Why would reinstalling void the warranty? You haven’t touched the hardware in any way, and software cannot (should not) ever be able to damage hardware.
[/quote]

http://enterprise.linux.com/article.pl?sid=07/03/23/1430204&from=rss[/quote]

That’s insane, when I buy hardware it’s mine and hardware is not tied to software in any way.
Of course I wouldn’t expect them to help with driver issues and suchlike (would be nice if they did, but the world isn’t perfect) but installing a non-standard OS completely voids the hardware warranty?

It’s kinda besides the point though, because we’re talking about installing XP on a machine that came with Vista, something tells me that would be OK as it’s still a Windows.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista + FF +RS == X-P
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

Mopman:

Why would reinstalling void the warranty? You haven’t touched the hardware in any way, and software cannot (should not) ever be able to damage hardware.

http://enterprise.linux.com/article.pl?sid=07/03/23/1430204&from=rss

Read full topic

item.title: Vista + FF +RS == X-P
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Hiaburi:

lol yea on the note of warranties, my friends sound and internet stopped working, so i did a reinstall, didn’t fix it, so we called dell, and they said installing an os voids warranty. In the end we figured out the problem…Bermuda…don’t ask…long story…

I HATE Dell customer support.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista + FF +RS == X-P
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:14, topic:90621”][quote author=kilermage3 link=topic=132282.msg1293839#msg1293839 date=1178814147]
Why you got a laptop, you coulf of just go to get an alienware and with what OS you want and everything that you want in that pc, or just return the one of your moms and buy from dell or hp or alienware online, with what OS and all the other programs you want.
[/quote]

All your buying with Alienware is a fancy case.[/quote]

True… I guess, but idk, he should of just ordered online, than buying from store.

Read full topic

No choice? You can install your own OS, you know.

Maybe it was already installed when he bought the laptop?
[/quote]

And that matters why?[/quote]

[quote=“USMC, post:4, topic:90621”]Wipe the laptop and install a fresh OS then.
I reccomend XP as vista is shockingly crap![/quote]
